M

MatrixFactorization - Class in algorithms
This class performs non-negative matrix factorization: for given matrix X, find matrices W and H that minimize the objective function
MatrixFactorization(UpdateRule, UpdateRule, double, int) - Constructor for class algorithms.MatrixFactorization
Creates an instance of MatrixFactorization
MatrixRegression - Class in algorithms
This class performs non-negative matrix regression: for given matrices X and W, find matrix H that minimizes the objective function
MatrixRegression(UpdateRule, double, int) - Constructor for class algorithms.MatrixRegression
Creates an instance of MatrixRegression
Measure - Class in measures
Provides a template for calculating the distance between matrices X and WH
Measure() - Constructor for class measures.Measure
 
measure - Variable in class updaterules.UpdateRule
Instance of Measure associated with this update rule
measures - package measures
Provides classes for estimating the distance between matrices X and WH.
MKLUpdateRule - Class in updaterules
Performs multiplicative update for the generalized Kullback-Leibler divergence with regularization
MKLUpdateRule(double, double) - Constructor for class updaterules.MKLUpdateRule
Creates an instance of MKLUpdateRule with given regularization coefficients
mu - Variable in class updaterules.RegularizationUpdateRule
l2-regularization coefficient
MUpdateRule - Class in updaterules
Performs multiplicative update for the euclidean distance with regularization
MUpdateRule(double, double) - Constructor for class updaterules.MUpdateRule
Creates an instance of MUpdateRule with given regularization coefficients
